title: Ursula Rodriguez: Counselor of Courage

story.text: Ursula Rodriguez starts her week with the discovery of an extraordinary power; she can sense when people are in distress and teleport to their location. Excited but cautious, she decides to explore this ability.

During a consulting session, Ursula hears a silent cry for help. She focuses, vanishes, and reappears near a young man on a bridge. With her counseling skills and newfound powers, she talks him down from the ledge, saving his life.
"Opportunity usually comes disguised in the form of misfortune, or temporary defeat." - Napoleon Hill
Ursula hones her teleportation skills, finding she can pinpoint locations with her counseling client's help. She uses this ability to quickly reach those in remote areas who urgently need counseling.
News of Ursula’s heroic deeds spreads. She receives calls from all over the city. Methodically, she balances her consulting commitments and her superhero duties.
Attempting to maintain her anonymity becomes increasingly difficult as she becomes more popular. Ursula dons a disguise, adopting the superhero name 'Counselor of Courage'.
Ursula reflects on her week, realizing the immense impact she’s had. She commits to a dual life: a consultant by day, and a lifesaving counselor by night.

ending: Thus began the dual journey of Ursula Rodriguez, wearing two capes—one of her profession, and the other of her superpower—both dedicated to the service of humanity.
moral: Using one's unique abilities for the good of others not only saves lives but also fulfills one's own.
